column4: hey all, will it damage my system if i put my HDD into my new computer? or do i have to reinstall the OS?
its all backed up. im not worried about losing the data, its that my build doesnt have integrated or card graphics and i dont want to buy a new one for a server....

I would try and run it, the only problem I can think of when I upgraded from amd K7 32-bit motherboard to intel 64-bit dual core was a problem with the nvidia graphics driver, which was fixed with an upgrade of the package :)
a backup is a good idea however, if you have sensitive data
